LouiEvolve Hip Hop and Arts Festival Hub

Client: LouiEvolve

LouiEvolve believes in the power of voice as the most influential tool for advancing individuals and communities. Dedicated to celebrating hip-hop culture in real time, LouiEvolve seeks to create moments today that will shape the future.

Project Overview: Crafting a Unique 3D Space for a Hip-Hop and Arts Festival

Our client, an innovative hip-hop artist, envisioned a digital extension of their live event to foster meaningful connections among musicians, fans, and promoters. The goal was to design a virtual 3D space that complements the energy and community spirit of the live festival.

Project Objective: Designing a 3D Environment for live video streaming of performers and artists

Our objective was to build an immersive, walkable 3D environment that captures the unique vibe of the event space. This interactive experience features videos and images, bringing the festival atmosphere to life for virtual attendees.

Our Approach: From Concept to Virtual Reality

We began by gathering visual references and sketching the initial layout for the digital environment. Using Blender, I carefully modeled the 3D scene, incorporating elements aligned with the clientâ€™s vision. For graffiti textures, I leveraged AI-generated artwork to authentically capture the style. The environment was further developed in Mozilla Spoke, where we created areas for guests to view live performances, explore galleries, or wander through an abstract landscape. This digital space offers attendees an engaging, interactive way to connect with the festival from anywhere.

Here is the final result:
https://nearhub.club/8WagYr6/louievolve-2024
